name: gauge-style
format:
<style id="hotNipi-gauge">
:root{
    --needle-color:#001100;
    --needle-second-color:#ff0000;
    --red-ticks:9;
    --sec-high-color:#ff00004f;
    --sec-normal-color:#00ff004f;
    --sec-low-color:#0000ff4f;
    --sec-sub-color:#0000ff8f;
}
.g-container {
    padding-top: 3px;
    padding-bottom: 3px;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    position: relative;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    user-select:none;
}
    
.g-body {
    width: 98%;
    height: 98%;
    border-radius: 15%;
    position: relative;
    display: flex;
    align-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    box-shadow: 0px 5px 8px #00000045;
    background: linear-gradient(0deg, rgba(78,78,78,1) 0%, rgba(215,215,215,1) 99%, rgba(236,236,236,1) 100%);
}

.g-body::before {    
    content: "";
    background-image: url("data:image/svg+xml;base64,PHN2ZyB4bWxucz0naHR0cDovL3d3dy53My5vcmcvMjAwMC9zdmcnIHdpZHRoPSc1JyBoZWlnaHQ9JzUnPgogIDxyZWN0IHdpZHRoPSc1JyBoZWlnaHQ9JzUnIGZpbGw9J3doaXRlJy8+CiAgPHBhdGggZD0nTTAgNUw1IDBaTTYgNEw0IDZaTS0xIDFMMSAtMVonIHN0cm9rZT0nIzg4OCcgc3Ryb2tlLXdpZHRoPScxJy8+Cjwvc3ZnPg=="); 
    background-repeat: repeat;
    position: absolute;
    top: 0px;
    right: 0px;
    bottom: 0px;
    left: 0px;
    opacity: 0.1;
    border-radius:15%;
}

.g-sector{
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    left: 50%;
   
    transform-origin: 0 0;
}
.g-sector-high {
    background: var(--sec-high-color);
    transform: rotate(328deg) skew(12deg, 23deg);
}
.g-sector-normal {
    background:var(--sec-normal-color);
    transform: rotate(328deg) skew(12deg, 23deg);
}
.g-sector-low {
    background:var(--sec-low-color);
    transform: rotate(328deg) skew(12deg, 23deg);
}
.g-sector-sub {
    background:var(--sec-sub-color);
    transform: rotate(328deg) skew(12deg, 23deg);
}

.g-ring {
    width: 94%;
    height: 94%;
    border-radius: 50%;
    position: relative;
    display: flex;
    align-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    background: linear-gradient(180deg, rgba(78,78,78,1) 0%, rgba(215,215,215,1) 99%, rgba(236,236,236,1) 100%);
}
.g-plate {
    overflow: hidden;
    width: 93%;
    height: 93%;
    border-radius: 50%;
    position: relative;
    box-shadow: inset 0 0 15px #000000a3;
    background: radial-gradient(circle, #dd8400 3%, rgb(196 205 209) 1%, rgb(177 183 186) 40%, rgb(191 193 194) 100%);
}
.g-plate-bright {
    overflow:hidden;
    width: 90%;
    height: 90%;
    border-radius: 50%;
    position: relative;
    box-shadow: inset 0 0 10px yellow;
    background: radial-gradient(circle, #ed9400 3%, rgb(255, 255, 255) 1%, rgb(255, 255, 158) 40%, rgb(148, 154, 160) 100%);
}

<--.g-plate-bright-red {
overflow: hidden;
width: 90%;
height: 90%;
border-radius: 50%;
position: relative;
box-shadow: inset 0 0 10px red;
background: radial-gradient(circle, #fca800 3%, rgb(255, 255, 255) 1%, rgb(255, 255, 200) 20%, rgb(180, 186, 192) 100%);
}-->

.g-plate-bright-red {
overflow:hidden;
width: 90%;
height: 90%;
border-radius: 50%;
position: relative;
box-shadow: inset 0 0 10px red;
background: radial-gradient(circle, #ed9400 3%, rgb(255, 255, 255) 1%, rgb(255, 255, 158) 40%, rgb(148, 154, 160) 100%);
}

<--.g-plate-bright-blue {
overflow: hidden;
width: 90%;
height: 90%;
border-radius: 50%;
position: relative;
box-shadow: inset 0 0 10px blue;
background: radial-gradient(circle, #00aaff 3%, rgb(255, 255, 255) 1%, rgb(255, 255, 200) 20%, rgb(180, 186, 192) 100%);
}-->

.g-plate-bright-blue {
overflow:hidden;
width: 90%;
height: 90%;
border-radius: 50%;
position: relative;
box-shadow: inset 0 0 10px blue;
background: radial-gradient(circle, #ed9400 3%, rgb(255, 255, 255) 1%, rgb(255, 255, 158) 40%, rgb(148, 154, 160) 100%);
}


.g-ticks {
    position: absolute;
    top:0;
    left:0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    filter: drop-shadow(2px 4px 6px black);
}
.g-tick {
    transform: rotate(calc(calc(270deg / var(--ga-tick-count)) * var(--ga-tick) - calc(calc(270deg / var(--ga-tick-count)) + 45deg)));
    background: #000;
    position: relative;
    left: 0;
    top: 50%;
    width: 100%;
    height: 1px;
    margin-bottom: -1px;
    background: linear-gradient(90deg,rgba(0,0,0,0) 0,rgba(0,0,0,0) 2%,rgb(0 0 0 / 60%) 2%,rgb(0 0 0 / 60%) 10%,rgba(0,0,0,0) 10%);
}
.g-subtick {
    transform: rotate(calc(calc(270deg / var(--ga-subtick-count)) * var(--ga-tick) - calc(calc(270deg / var(--ga-subtick-count)) + 45deg)));
    background: #000;
    position: relative;
    left: 0;
    top: 50%;
    width: 100%;
    height: 1px;
    margin-bottom: -1px;
    background: linear-gradient(90deg,rgba(0,0,0,0) 0,rgba(0,0,0,0) 2%,rgb(0 0 0 / 40%) 2%,rgb(0 0 0 / 40%) 6%,rgba(0,0,0,0) 6%);
}

.g-num {
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    left: 50%;
    text-align: center;
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%) rotate(calc(calc(270deg / var(--ga-tick-count)) * var(--ga-tick) - calc(calc(270deg /
    var(--ga-tick-count)) + 45deg))) translate(calc(-1px * var(--container-size) * var(--gn-distance))) rotate(calc(calc(270deg / var(--ga-tick-count)) * var(--ga-tick) *-1 -
    calc(calc(270deg / var(--ga-tick-count))*-1 - 45deg)));
}

.g-nums {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    color: #000000a1;
    font-size: calc(var(--container-size) * 20%);
    font-weight: 500;
    filter: drop-shadow(2px 4px 10px black);
}
.g-needle {
    transform: rotate(calc(270deg * calc(var(--gauge-value, 0deg) / 100) - 45deg));
    transition: transform 1s;
    background: #000;
    position: absolute;
    left: 0;
    top: 49%;
    width: 100%;
    height: 2%;
    filter:drop-shadow(0px 1px 3px #00000080);
    background: linear-gradient(90deg,rgba(2,0,36,0) 0,rgba(0,0,0,0) 15%,var(--needle-color) 15%,var(--needle-color) 50%,rgba(0,0,0,0) 50%);
}
.g-needle-second {
    transform: rotate(calc(270deg * calc(var(--gauge-value-second, 0deg) / 100) - 45deg));
    transition: transform 1s;
    background: #000;
    position: absolute;
    left: 0;
    top: 49%;
    width: 100%;
    height: 2%;
    filter:drop-shadow(0px 1px 3px #ff000080);  
    background: linear-gradient(90deg,rgba(2,0,36,0) 0,rgba(0,0,0,0) 15%,var(--needle-second-color) 15%,var(--needle-second-color) 50%,rgba(0,0,0,0) 50%);
}
.g-needle-ring {
    position: absolute;
    width: calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5%);
    height: calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5%);
    top: 50%;
    left: 50%;
    background: var(--needle-color);
    border-radius: 50%;
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
    box-shadow: 0 1px 4px #0000009c;
}
.g-val{
    position: absolute;
    text-align: center;
    left: 50%;
    bottom: 8%;
    width: 80px;
    transform: translateX(-50%);
    font-family: monospace;
    font-size:  calc(var(--container-size) * 40%);
    color: #000000a1;
    filter: drop-shadow(2px 3px 2px #00000050);
}

.g-label{
    position: absolute;
    text-align: center;
    left: 50%;
    top: 58%;
    width: 100%;
    transform: translateX(-50%);
    font-family: monospace;
    font-size:  calc(var(--container-size) * 18%);
    color: #000000a1;
    filter: drop-shadow(2px 3px 2px #00000080);
}
.g-label::after{
    content: var(--g-unit);
    font-size: clamp(1em,calc(var(--container-size) * 40%),1.5em);
    position: absolute;
    left: 0;
    top: 100%;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
}
.g-rivets{
    position: absolute;
    left:0;
    top:0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
}

.g-rivet {
    position: absolute;
    width: calc(var(--container-size) * 2px);
    height: calc(var(--container-size) * 2px);
    border-radius: 50px;
    background: linear-gradient(135deg, #adadad 0%,#d3d3d3 51%,#d1d1d1 68%,#8c8c8c 100%);
    box-shadow: 0px 2px 4px #000, -1px -1px 5px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
    border: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.1);
}
.g-rivet:nth-child(1){
    top:calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5px);
    left:calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5px);
}
.g-rivet:nth-child(2){
    top:calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5px);
    right:calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5px);
}
.g-rivet:nth-child(3){
    bottom:calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5px);
    left:calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5px);
}
.g-rivet:nth-child(4){
    bottom:calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5px);
    right:calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5px);
}

.g-rivet::before {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    left: 50%;
    top: 50%;
    width: calc(var(--container-size) * 10%);
    height: calc(var(--container-size) * 10%);
    box-shadow: inset 0px 1px 2px #222;
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
    border-radius: 50%;
    border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.3);
}
</style>

name: Forest Dashboard Custom CSS
format:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">

<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <style>
        root,
        a,
        button,
        p,
        div {
            user-select: none !important;
        }

        body {
            background: linear-gradient(55deg,
                    #8a8a8a 0%,
                    /* Dark gray for ground */
                    #48814a 30%,
                    /* Green for grass */
                    #2c6020 100%
                    /* Darker green for forest background */
                );
            touch-callout: none !important;
            margin: 0;
            font-family: 'Arial', sans-serif;
            overflow-x: hidden;
        }

        body.nr-dashboard-theme md-toolbar,
        body.nr-dashboard-theme md-content md-card {
            background-color: transparent !important;
            color: #FFFFFF;
        }

        ui-card-panel {
            background-color: rgba(139, 188, 111, 0.3) !important;
            /* Light green with transparency */
            border-radius: 10px;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
            transition: background-color 0.3s ease-in-out;
        }

        ui-card-panel:hover {
            background-color: rgba(139, 188, 111, 0.4) !important;
            /* Slightly darker on hover */
        }

        .md-card.md-default-theme,
        md-card {
            border-radius: 10px;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
            transition: box-shadow 0.3s ease-in-out;
        }

        .md-card:hover {
            box-shadow: 0 6px 12px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
        }

        .nr-dashboard-switch.ng-scope {
            background-color: rgba(139, 188, 111, 0.3) !important;
            /* Light green switch background */
            transition: background-color 0.3s ease-in-out;
        }

        .nr-dashboard-switch.ng-scope:hover {
            background-color: rgba(139, 188, 111, 0.5) !important;
            /* Darker green on hover */
        }

        .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-button .md-button {
            background-color: rgba(139, 188, 111, 0.3);
            /* Light green button */
            transition: background-color 0.3s ease-in-out;
        }

        .md-button {
            border-radius: 10px;
        }

        .nr-dashboard-cardpanel layout-column {
            background-color: rgba(139, 188, 111, 0.3) !important;
            /* Slightly darker green with transparency */
            border-radius: 10px;
            transition: background-color 0.3s ease-in-out;
        }

        .nr-dashboard-theme ui-card-panel {
            border: none;
        }

        .nr-dashboard-template {
            overflow-y: visible;
        }

        .nr-dashboard-theme md-content md-card {
            background-color: transparent !important;
        }

        .nr-dashboard-theme ui-card-panel p.nr-dashboard-cardtitle {
            color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
            /* Lighter text color for readability */
        }
    </style>
</head>

<body>
    <!-- Your HTML content goes here -->
    <!-- Make sure to include any other necessary scripts or libraries -->
    <script>
        document.ontouchmove = function (e) {
            e.preventDefault();
        }
    </script>
</body>

</html>

<style>
:root {
    --needle-color: #001100;
    --needle-color-secondary: #ffdd30;
    --target-needle-color: #ffa500;
    --red-ticks: 9;
    /*--zone-color-high: #ff5d4ebf; red
    --zone-color-warn: #ffb52d8c; yellow
    --zone-color-normal: #91ff4e85; green
    --zone-color-low: #4ec3ff85* #blue
    800080 purple 4B0082*/
    --zone-color-high: #4B0082;

    --zone-color-low: #ff5d4ebf;
}
.g-zone {
    position: absolute;
    width: 82%;
    height: 82%;
    top: 8%;
    left: 10%;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border-radius: 0 100% 0 0;
    border-color: var(--zone-color-normal);
    border-top: 7px solid;
    border-right: 7px solid;
    clip-path: polygon(0% 0%, 100% 0%, 0% 0%, 0% 100% );
}
.g-zone.high {
    border-color: var(--zone-color-high);
    clip-path: polygon(0% 0%, 100% 0%, 16% 0%, 0% 100% );
}
.g-zone.warn {
    border-color: var(--zone-color-warn);
    clip-path: polygon(16% 0%, 100% 0%, 73% 0%, 0% 100% );
}
.g-zone.normal {
    border-color: var(--zone-color-normal);
    clip-path: polygon(0% 50%, 100% 0%, 100% 67%, 0% 100% );
}
.g-zone.low {
    border-color: var(--zone-color-low);
    clip-path: polygon(100% 68%, 100% 0%, 100% 100%, 0% 100% );
}

}

    position: absolute;

    background-image: url("data:image/svg+xml;base64,PHN2ZyB4bWxucz0naHR0cDovL3d3dy53My5vcmcvMjAwMC9zdmcnIHdpZHRoPSc1JyBoZWlnaHQ9JzUnPgogIDxyZWN0IHdpZHRoPSc1JyBoZWlnaHQ9JzUnIGZpbGw9J3doaXRlJy8+CiAgPHBhdGggZD0nTTAgNUw1IDBaTTYgNEw0IDZaTS0xIDFMMSAtMVonIHN0cm9rZT0nIzg4OCcgc3Ryb2tlLXdpZHRoPScxJy8+Cjwvc3ZnPg==");
    background-repeat: repeat;
}

.g-ring {
    position: relative;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    align-content: center;
    width: 94%;

.quarter-top-right *>.g-tick {

    background: linear-gradient(270deg,rgb(0 0 0 / 60%) 0%, rgb(0 0 0 / 60%) 9%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 9%);
    transform: rotate(calc(calc(90deg / var(--ga-tick-count)) * var(--ga-tick) - calc(calc(90deg / var(--ga-tick-count)) - 270deg)));

.g-tick.clock {

}

    transform: rotate(calc(calc(270deg / var(--ga-subtick-count)) * var(--ga-tick) - calc(calc(270deg / var(--ga-subtick-count)) + 45deg)));
}

.quarter-top-right *>.g-subtick {
    width: 86%;
    position: absolute;
    left: 0;
    top: 100%;
    background: linear-gradient(270deg,rgb(0 0 0 / 60%) 0%, rgb(0 0 0 / 60%) 5%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 5%);
    transform: rotate(calc(calc(90deg / var(--ga-subtick-count)) * var(--ga-tick) - calc(calc(90deg / var(--ga-subtick-count)) - 270deg)));
    transform-origin: 0% 0%;
}
.quarter-top-left *>.g-subtick {

}
.g-label::after{
    content: var(--g-unit);
    font-size: clamp(1em,calc(var(--container-size) * 40%),1.5em);
    position: absolute;
    left: 0;
    top: 100%;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
}
.g-rivets{
    position: absolute;
    left:0;
    top:0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
}

.g-rivet {
    position: absolute;

    height: calc(var(--container-size) * 2px);

    background: linear-gradient(135deg, #adadad 0%,#d3d3d3 51%,#d1d1d1 68%,#8c8c8c 100%);
    box-shadow: 0px 2px 4px #000, -1px -1px 5px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
    border: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.1);
}
.g-rivet:nth-child(1){
    top:calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5px);
    left:calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5px);
}
.g-rivet:nth-child(2){
    top:calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5px);
    right:calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5px);
}
.g-rivet:nth-child(3){
    bottom:calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5px);
    left:calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5px);
}
.g-rivet:nth-child(4){
    bottom:calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5px);
    right:calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5px);
}

.g-rivet::before {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    left: 50%;
    top: 50%;
    width: calc(var(--container-size) * 10%);
    height: calc(var(--container-size) * 10%);
    box-shadow: inset 0px 1px 2px #222;
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
    border-radius: 50%;
    border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.3);
}
</style>

name: Mini Observatory Dashboard Custom CSS
format:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">

<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <style>
        root,
        a,
        button,
        p,
        div {
            user-select: none !important;
        }

        body {
            background: linear-gradient(180deg,
                    #000033 0%,
                    /* Dark blue for night sky */
                    #000066 50%,
                    /* Darker blue for night sky */
                    #000033 100%
                    /* Dark blue for night sky */
                );
            touch-callout: none !important;
            margin: 0;
            font-family: 'Arial', sans-serif;
            overflow-x: hidden;
        }

        body.nr-dashboard-theme md-toolbar,
        body.nr-dashboard-theme md-content md-card {
            background-color: transparent !important;
            color: #FFFFFF;
        }

        ui-card-panel {
            background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3) !important;
            /* Light grey with transparency for observatory structure */
            border-radius: 10px;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
            transition: background-color 0.3s ease-in-out;
        }

        ui-card-panel:hover {
            background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.4) !important;
            /* Slightly darker grey on hover */
        }

        .md-card.md-default-theme,
        md-card {
            border-radius: 10px;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
            transition: box-shadow 0.3s ease-in-out;
        }

        .md-card:hover {
            box-shadow: 0 6px 12px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
        }

        .nr-dashboard-switch.ng-scope {
            background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3) !important;
            /* Light grey switch background */
            transition: background-color 0.3s ease-in-out;
        }

        .nr-dashboard-switch.ng-scope:hover {
            background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5) !important;
            /* Darker grey on hover */
        }

        .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-button .md-button {
            background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
            /* Light grey button */
            transition: background-color 0.3s ease-in-out;
        }

        .md-button {
            border-radius: 10px;
        }

        .nr-dashboard-cardpanel layout-column {
            background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3) !important;
            /* Slightly darker grey with transparency */
            border-radius: 10px;
            transition: background-color 0.3s ease-in-out;
        }

        .nr-dashboard-theme ui-card-panel {
            border: none;
        }

        .nr-dashboard-template {
            overflow-y: visible;
        }

        .nr-dashboard-theme md-content md-card {
            background-color: transparent !important;
        }

        .nr-dashboard-theme ui-card-panel p.nr-dashboard-cardtitle {
            color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
            /* Lighter text color for readability */
        }
    </style>
</head>

<body>

        }

</html>
